item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: This is my first post and its here just to test everything and confirm that everything is working fine. Since this is a tech blog, nothing better for a test than running a “Hello, world!” program. So, I leave below the implementation of this program in the languages with I’m currently working these days. Hello, world! em Java class Hello { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, world!"); } } Hello, world!
